attributes.action: Stop giving taxpayer pounds to Booktrust.
attributes.additional_details: It is immoral that taxpayer pounds that could be used to treat people with medical problems in the NHS is being given away to a charity with direct and conflicting links with the Liberal Democratic Party leader, Nick Clegg.  It was his direct intervention which reversed the original decision to stop taxpayer funding of this charity.  That is fraud and deception at the highest level.  It MUST be stopped.
